resources.string: ATTENTION:\nYou may only do this once per turn

You can only move within your territories. A move order is only executed if the source region is attached to the destination via a path of planets you own. Fuel cost is dependent on the number of units moved.
You can only attack adjacent planets from your attacking planet. Fuel cost is dependent on the number of units attacking with.
You need tech level 4 to teleport. You can teleport to any planet you own, it does not need to be adjacent. This order costs tech resources.
You can raid adjacent planets from ones you own. When you raid you steal tech and fuel resources from your opponent.
Boosting units requires increased tech level. Be sure to upgrade your tech level first!
Boost your tech level to unlock other orders and features.
Boost your resource production on a planet, but be careful if you lose it your opponent gets your extra production.
